what: IFN volume and biomass allometry models
title: IFN volume and biomass allometry models
text: goal IFNallometry provide routines calculating volume biomass forest stands using allometries developed Spanish Forest Inventory (IFN) plot data.

title: IFN volume and biomass allometry models
text: can install development version IFNallometry GitHub :

title: IFN volume and biomass allometry models
text: example data set forest plot input package: code result calculating timber volumes, using plot ID extract Spanish province: code result calculating biomass components:
code: library(IFNallometry) data("exampleTreeData") head(exampleTreeData) #>        ID Species        N  DBH   H #> 344 80001      22 31.83099 18.9 7.5 #> 345 80001      22 14.14711 29.2 7.5 #> 346 80001      22 14.14711 23.9 9.5 #> 347 80001      22 14.14711 23.7 7.0 #> 348 80001      22 14.14711 32.7 8.0 #> 349 80001      22 31.83099 13.7 8.0 example_volumes <- IFNvolume(exampleTreeData, provinceFromID = TRUE) head(example_volumes) #>      ID Species           Name FC      VCC      VSC          VLE       IAVC #> 1 80001      22 Pinus uncinata  1 3.602559 2.860209 -0.035419361 0.12176755 #> 2 80001      22 Pinus uncinata  1 3.229656 2.690636  0.033717806 0.07381033 #> 3 80001      22 Pinus uncinata  1 2.805269 2.321029  0.018885424 0.06887026 #> 4 80001      22 Pinus uncinata  1 2.150192 1.750104 -0.001320525 0.06097990 #> 5 80001      22 Pinus uncinata  1 4.176124 3.514192  0.071731231 0.08434162 #> 6 80001      22 Pinus uncinata  1 2.441344 1.846656 -0.061216067 0.10679360 example_biomass <- IFNbiomass(exampleTreeData) head(example_biomass) #>      ID Species           Name SpeciesAllom      NameAllom    Roots      Stem #> 1 80001      22 Pinus uncinata           22 Pinus uncinata 2194.477 1731.1354 #> 2 80001      22 Pinus uncinata           22 Pinus uncinata 2328.041 1836.4987 #> 3 80001      22 Pinus uncinata           22 Pinus uncinata 1559.627 1558.4148 #> 4 80001      22 Pinus uncinata           22 Pinus uncinata 1533.634 1129.1675 #> 5 80001      22 Pinus uncinata           22 Pinus uncinata 2919.580 2456.6831 #> 6 80001      22 Pinus uncinata           22 Pinus uncinata 1153.051  970.2358 #>    Branches Leaves Needles Bark   Aerial    Total #> 1 1448.8434     NA      NA   NA 3179.979 5374.456 #> 2 1308.8274     NA      NA   NA 3145.326 5473.367 #> 3  877.7623     NA      NA   NA 2436.177 3995.804 #> 4  958.3115     NA      NA   NA 2087.479 3621.113 #> 5 1541.9793     NA      NA   NA 3998.662 6918.243 #> 6  748.7747     NA      NA   NA 1719.010 2872.062

what: IFNallometry: IFN volume and biomass allometry models — IFNallometry-package
title: IFNallometry: IFN volume and biomass allometry models — IFNallometry-package
text: Routines calculating volume biomass Spanish Forest Inventory (IFN) plots.

title: IFNallometry: IFN volume and biomass allometry models — IFNallometry-package
text: Maintainer: Miquel De Cáceres miquelcaceres@gmail.com [ORCID](https://orcid.org/0000-0001-7132-2080)

title: Biomass allometry models — IFNbiomass
text: Static models biomass (kg/ha) stem, roots, branches, leaves/needles bark species IFN

title: Biomass allometry models — IFNbiomass
code: IFNbiomass(x, as.CO2 = FALSE, area = NA, DBHclasses = NULL, verbose = FALSE)

title: Biomass allometry models — IFNbiomass
text: x data frame tree records rows columns: ID: String identifying forest stand. Species: Species numeric used IFN species name matching names given species_ifn. DBH: Tree diameter breast height (cm). H: Tree height (m). N: Tree density factor (ind/ha). .CO2 Flag indicate output kg CO2 / ha instead kg dry weight / ha. Percentage carbon per dry weight biomass species taken Montero et al. (2005) (turn, Ibáñez et al. 2002). area Either 'Atlantic' 'Mediterranean' specify allometric equations specific area (Pinus pinaster) DBHclasses numeric vector DBH class limits (see breaks function cut), used group results DBH class (addition species plot). DBHclasses = NULL grouping basis DBH classes performed. verbose flag indicate console output biomass calculation process

title: Biomass allometry models — IFNbiomass
text: DBHclasses = NULL, function IFNbiomass returns data frame many rows tree records x columns 'ID', 'Species', 'Roots', 'Stem', 'Branches', 'Leaves', 'Needles', 'Bark', 'Aerial' 'Total'. DBHclasses != NULL extra column DBHclass given data frame less rows tree records x.

title: Biomass allometry models — IFNbiomass
text: Function IFNbiomass determines allometric equation biomass fraction (.e. compartment) using species code. equations calculated form height diameter breast height (DBH) felled trees. Biomass values equations refer individual trees, function multiplies result density individuals 'N', resulting value units kg/ha. Biomass branches result adding result equations calibrated different branch diameters. species provided character names, exact matching function startsWith used.

title: Biomass allometry models — IFNbiomass
text: Diéguez-Aranda, U., . Rojo Alboreca, F. Castedo-Dorado, J. G. Álvarez González, M. Barrio-Anta, F. Crecente-Campo, J. M. González González, C. Pérez-Cruzado, R. Rodríguez Soalleiro, C. . López-Sánchez, M. Á. Balboa-Murias, J. J. Gorgoso Varela, F. Sánchez Rodríguez (2009) Herramientas selvícolas para la gestión forestal sostenible en Galicia. Dirección Xeral de Montes, Consellería Medio Rural, Xunta de Galicia. Ibáñez JJ, Vayreda J., Gracia C. (2002) Metodología complementaria al Inventario Forestal Nacional en Catalunya. En: Bravo F.; del Río M.; del Peso C. (eds.) El inventario Forestal Nacional. Elemento clave para la gestión forestal sostenible: 67-77. Fundación General de la Universidad de Valladolid Montero G, Ruiz-Peinado R, Muñoz M (2005) Producción de biomasa y fijación de CO2 por los bosques españoles. Monografias INIA: Serie Forestal nº 13. Ruiz-Peinado, R., M. Rio, G. Montero (2011) New models estimating carbon sink capacity Spanish. Forest Systems 20:176–188. Ruiz-Peinado, R., G. Montero, M. Del Rio (2012) Biomass models estimate carbon stocks hardwood tree species. Forest Systems 21:42.

what: Wrapper biomass function for packages medfate and medfateland — IFNbiomass_medfate
title: Wrapper biomass function for packages medfate and medfateland — IFNbiomass_medfate
text: Wrapper function used calculate tree biomass packages medfate medfateland.

title: Wrapper biomass function for packages medfate and medfateland — IFNbiomass_medfate
code: IFNbiomass_medfate(   x,   SpParams,   area = NA,   fraction = "total",   level = "cohort" )

title: Wrapper biomass function for packages medfate and medfateland — IFNbiomass_medfate
text: x Data frame tree data forest object package medfate. SpParams Data frame species parameters suitable medfate package (used). area Either 'Atlantic' 'Mediterranean' specify allometric equations specific area (Pinus pinaster) fraction string, either "total" (total biomass), "aboveground" (aboveground biomass) "belowground" (belowground biomass). level string, either "cohort" (tree cohort biomass) "stand" (stand-level biomass).

title: Wrapper biomass function for packages medfate and medfateland — IFNbiomass_medfate
text: vector biomass tree cohort (Mg/ha dry weight) used medfate medfateland packages.

title: Wrapper biomass function for packages medfate and medfateland — IFNbiomass_medfate
text: Values parameter x supplied calling function (e.g. modify_forest_structure). Values parameters area, fraction level (defaults need changed) supplied using list parameter biomass_arguments.

title: Volume allometry models — IFNvolume
text: Static models wood volume (VCC, VSC, VLE & IAVC) species province IFN

title: Volume allometry models — IFNvolume
code: IFNvolume(   x,   IFN = c(3, 2),   FC = 1:6,   code_missing = "99",   provinceFromID = FALSE,   DBHclasses = NULL,   verbose = FALSE )

title: Volume allometry models — IFNvolume
text: x data frame tree records rows columns: ID: String identifying forest stand. Species: Species numeric used IFN species name matching names given species_ifn. DBH: Tree diameter breast height (cm). H: Tree height (m). N: Tree density factor (ind/ha). Provincia: Numeric character province code (optional). provided, user set provinceFromID = TRUE. FC: cubic content form tree (optional). case, value parameter FC overriden. IFN Integer integer pair indicate order preferred forest inventory: (IFN=2 indicates using IFN-2 , IFN=3 indicates using IFN-3 , IFN=c(3,2) indicates using IFN3 available IFN2) FC Vector integers indicate preferred cubic content forms (1 6) Forma 1. Arboles fusiformes prácticamente en todo su fuste, con troncos maderables,    limpios y derechos de más de 6 m, flecha inferior al 1    y diámetro normal mayor de 20 cm. Forma 2. Arboles que cumplan las cuatro condiciones siguientes: ser fusiformes, tener    troncos maderables de 4 o más metros, ramificarse por la parte superior y pertenecer    la forma 1. Forma 3. Arboles fusiformes pequeños, en los que el diámetro del fuste de 75 mm    queda por debajo de los 4 m de altura. Forma 4. Árboles cuyo tronco principal se ramifica antes de los 4 m de altura y que    pertenezcan algunas de las siguientes especies 07, 12, 16, 23, 41, 42, 43, 44, 45, 46,    47, 48, 49, 55, 56, 57, 66, 67, 71, 72, 74, 75, 79 y 94. Forma 5. Arboles cuyo tronco principal es tortuoso, está dañado o es muy ramoso, por    lo que admite la clasificación en formas 1, 2 o 3. También pies de altura de fuste    menor de 4 m si son de especies diferentes las de los códigos 4 y 6. Forma 6. Árboles descabezados o trasmochos los que se les ha cortado la parte    superior del tronco y las ramas en puntos próximos su inserción en el tronco y que    pertenezcan algunas de las siguientes especies: 41, 42, 43, 55, 56, 71, 72 y 94. code_missing Species code use equations available species recorded ("99" Otras frondosas) provinceFromID flag indicate province code extracted first characters column ID x. DBHclasses numeric vector DBH class limits (see breaks function cut), used group results DBH class (addition species plot). DBHclasses = NULL grouping basis DBH classes performed. verbose flag indicate console output volume calculation process

title: Volume allometry models — IFNvolume
text: DBHclasses = NULL, data frame many rows tree records x columns: ID: Forest plot identifier, given input. Species: Species code species name given input. Name: Species name given volume allometry equations. FC: Cubic content form used calculate volume. VCC: Volumen con corteza (m3/ha). VSC: Volumen sin corteza (m3/ha). VLE: Volumen de leñas (m3/ha). IAVC: Incremento anual del volumen con corteza (m3/ha/yr). DBHclasses != NULL extra column DBHclass given data frame less rows tree records x.

title: Volume allometry models — IFNvolume
text: volumetric equation used tree record depends province, species, cubic content form volume parameter (VCC, VSC, VLE IAVC). Volumes given per hectare (.e. result volumetric equation multiplied density 'N'). cubic content form given 'x', function iterates values 'FC' equation available. Species can supplied IFN codes species names. latter case, function convert codes using species_ifn data table. species provided character names, exact matching function startsWith used.

what: Wrapper volume function for packages medfate and medfateland — IFNvolume_medfate
title: Wrapper volume function for packages medfate and medfateland — IFNvolume_medfate
text: Wrapper function used calculate timber volumes packages medfate medfateland.

title: Wrapper volume function for packages medfate and medfateland — IFNvolume_medfate
Wrapper volume function for packages medfate and medfateland — IFNvolume_medfate
text: x Data frame tree data forest object package medfate. SpParams Data frame species parameters suitable medfate package (used). province Spanish province code. min_dbh Minimum diameter breast height (cm) timber estimation. level string, either "cohort" (tree cohort volume) "stand" (stand-level volume).

title: Wrapper volume function for packages medfate and medfateland — IFNvolume_medfate
text: vector timber volumes per tree cohort (m3/ha) used medfateland simulations.

title: Wrapper volume function for packages medfate and medfateland — IFNvolume_medfate
text: Values parameters x SpParams supplied simulation function (e.g. fordyn_scenario) calculations. Values parameters province min_dbh supplied using list parameter volume_arguments. See documentation package medfateland.

title: Example datasets — exampleTreeData
text: Data sets given illustrate input data structures.

title: Example datasets — exampleTreeData
text: Tree data corresponding three forest plots. Data frame 40 rows (tree records) columns: ID: Forest plot code, defined combination province code "estadillo". Species: Tree species code. N: Tree density (individuals per hectare) record represents. DBH: Tree diameter breast height (cm). H: Tree height (m)
